name: Mechmie's Puzzles
description:
A simple and short RPG Maker MV puzzle game, featuring Mechmie the robot! She loves learning, and is always up for a good puzzle. In each level, Mechmie must reach the end tile, but there will always be some sort of obstacle in the way.

There are three main areas, each with their own unique puzzle mechanics.

With 45 levels, many harder than others, this game will keep you occupied for a while! (Estimated time: 30-45 minutes)
